Text: sounds great, but whats with the weird format?
Use need to use a program like SoundTaxi to remove Audible's DRM before sharing.
My version of SoundTaxi Pro couldn't remove the DRM from these two aax files.  Anyone else have success?
can someone re-post in mp3 format? I have been waiting for this book to get on here!!
SoundTaxi does not crack Audible's DRM, it only allows the people who bought the audiobook (the uploader) to transcode the aax into mp3s.
To bad the upload is useless in this format.
Anyone have a solution to either convert these or even to play them?
is no one going to re-post in MP3????

Also hoping someone can upload this in mp3 format... 

Or work out a way to crack the DRM... There must be a way. 

I tried DRM buster which claimed to be able to do it, but it's the same as the others mentioned; requires authorisation to convert the file.
